sentences.english: Filter can be fully restored after the Qing brush water flow.
sentences.chinese: 濾芯清刷後可完全恢復水流量。

sentences.english: Ion-exchange resin sells in market in form of filter.
sentences.chinese: 離子交換樹脂以濾芯的形式在市場上銷售。

sentences.english: Both filters are top-loading and include element indicators in the cap.
sentences.chinese: 幷包括濾芯發訊器在頂蓋上。

sentences.english: If a sudden pressure dro occurs, please check whether the elements of fine filter have been damaged.
sentences.chinese: 過濾壓力突然下降，請檢查精細濾芯是否被擊穿。

sentences.english: Install the just now humid element and tighten the shelter stand.
sentences.chinese: 按裝好剛溼潤的濾芯並將殼座卡緊。

sentences.english: As the outer bore diameter is larger than the inner one, the filter cartridges have a good deep-level filtering capability.
sentences.chinese: 濾芯過濾孔徑外大內小，具有優良的深層過濾效果。

sentences.english: Squeeze full bobble of water through filter.
sentences.chinese: 把水通過濾芯充分擠壓漏接出來。

sentences.english: Product according to the customer demand can adopt imported filter material production filter.
sentences.chinese: 產品可根據客戶需求，採用進口濾材生產濾芯。

sentences.english: Jumbo cartridge filter housings are designed to accept a single cartridge for easy installation and replacement.
sentences.chinese: 珍寶濾芯過濾器外殼的設計是爲了安裝和更換濾筒。

sentences.english: Net of mud box and filter shall be removed or isolated.
sentences.chinese: 泥箱和器的濾芯應取出或隔離。

sentences.english: Oil filter design life usually use for 2000 hours.
sentences.chinese: 油濾芯設計使用壽命通常爲2000小時。

sentences.english: This arrangement allows for replacement of dirty elements without stopping the gas turbine.
sentences.chinese: 這種配置便於在燃機不停機的情況下更換濾芯。

sentences.english: This filtering element may be in the form of a screen but usually is a throwaway paper element.
sentences.chinese: 這種濾清器中安裝濾膜，但通常安裝紙製濾芯。

sentences.english: The invention relates to a new formula of drying filter core for refrigeration system use.
sentences.chinese: 一種製冷系統用乾燥過濾芯的製備新方法。

definition: a device used to check money and detect counterfeit bills
to hide dirt, to conceal corruption (idiom); to shelter evil people and accept wrongdoing/aiding and abetting wicked deeds
to spread litter in a cowshed, pigsty etc
